__e: You've got two more years, at best. Lemon,
Look, I know how you feel about Lemon, and, well, there's nothing between her and me anymore.
It just wouldn't be the same without you and Lemon there, and she already said yes.
Turns out that Lemon wasn't the girl for me.
Well, yes, I suppose, but only because Miss Lemon is incapable of doing anything on her own.
Lemon, don't ever say you're just you. Because you are better than you.
There is no world in which I could pursue a relationship with a man Lemon once loved.
You are the last person Lemon needs to be seeing right now.
No, I, you know, I-I asked her about her pies, and Lemon said that, you know, she was in great demand, and that maybe we ought to do something about it...
